data.lyric:
[ti:My Little Love]
[ar:Adele]
[al:30]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]My Little Love - Adele
[00:00.11]Lyrics by：Adele Adkins/Greg Kurstin
[00:00.29]Composed by：Adele Adkins/Greg Kurstin
[00:00.47]Mh mh
[00:10.87]
[00:12.13]My little love
[00:15.15]I see your eyes widen like an ocean
[00:21.61]When you look at me so full of my emotions
[00:27.67]I'm findin' it hard to be here sincerely
[00:34.03]I know you feel lost it's my fault completely
[00:40.25]
[00:42.13]Tell me you love me
[00:44.15]
[00:46.46]I love you a million percent
[00:50.13]I don't recognise myself in the coldness of the daylight
[00:59.34]So I ain't surprised you can read through all of my lies
[01:05.61]I feel so bad to be here when I'm so guilty
[01:11.97]I'm so far gone and you're the only one who can save me
[01:18.33]Oi I feel like you don't lovе me
[01:20.23]Why do you feel like that
[01:21.31]Do you like likе me
[01:23.10]You know mommy doesn't like anyone else like I like you right
[01:28.18]I'm holdin' on
[01:32.17]Barely
[01:34.51]Mama's got a lot to learn
[01:37.98]It's heavy
[01:40.75]I'm holdin' on
[01:44.67]Catch me
[01:46.81]Mama's got a lot to learn
[01:50.94]Teach me
[01:54.14]
[01:54.89]Mummy's been having a lot of big feelings recently
[01:57.13]Like how
[01:58.33]Just like mummy I'm I'm the feeling that I have
[02:02.68]Like hm I feel a bit confused
[02:07.18]Why
[02:07.71]I don't know
[02:09.06]And I feel like I don't really know what I'm doing
[02:12.74]
[02:14.27]Oh at all
[02:17.51]At all
[02:18.70]And that would make me go
[02:21.19]My little love
[02:24.72]Tell me do you feel the way my past aches
[02:31.09]When you lay on me can you hear the way my heart breaks
[02:37.10]I wanted you to have everything I never had
[02:43.54]I'm so sorry if what I've done makes you feel sad
[02:50.33]
[02:51.93]I love your dad 'cause he gave you to me
[02:54.39]
[02:56.10]You're half me and you're half daddy
[02:58.16]Oh
[02:59.40]I'm holdin' on
[03:03.67]Barely
[03:06.05]Mama's got a lot to learn
[03:09.58]It's heavy
[03:12.32]I'm holdin' on
[03:16.26]Catch me
[03:18.64]Mama's got a lot to learn
[03:22.54]Teach me
[03:26.13]
[03:38.25]I'm having a bad day I'm having a very anxious day
[03:44.06]
[03:46.97]I feel very paranoid I feel very stressed
[03:52.28]
[03:53.80]Um I have a hangover which never helps but
[04:00.85]
[04:06.66]I feel like today is the first day since I left him that I feel lonely
[04:16.48]
[04:20.01]And I never feel lonely I love being on my own
[04:24.04]
[04:26.13]I always preferred being on my own than being with people
[04:28.49]
[04:31.31]And I feel like maybe I've been like overcompensating
[04:36.00]
[04:37.78]Being out and stuff like that to keep my mind off of him
[04:44.98]And I feel like today I'm home and I wanna be at home
[04:49.02]I just wanna watch TV and curl up in a ball and
[04:53.27]
[04:55.51]Be in my sweats and stuff like that I just feel really lonely
[04:59.31]
[05:01.54]I feel a bit frightened that I might feel like this a lot
data.trans:
[ti:My Little Love]
[ar:Adele]
[al:30]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.11]//
[00:00.29]//
[00:00.47]//
[00:10.87]
[00:12.13]我的小宝贝
[00:15.15]我看到你睁着清澈碧绿的双眸
[00:21.61]无辜地注视着我 刹那间我五味杂陈
[00:27.67]实话实说 置身于此 甚是为难 
[00:34.03]我知道你的迷茫失落 这完全都是我的错
[00:40.25]
[00:42.13]向我表达爱意
[00:44.15]
[00:46.46]我深爱着你
[00:50.13]在刺骨的寒冷里 我快要不认识自己
[00:59.34]所以你能识破我所有的谎言 我并不感到惊讶
[01:05.61]内疚自责走到如今这般田地 我也很难过
[01:11.97]我已深陷泥沼 你是唯一能拯救我的人
[01:18.33]我觉得你并不爱我
[01:20.23]你为什么会有这样的感觉
[01:21.31]你是否喜欢我
[01:23.10]你知道妈妈不会像喜欢你一样去爱别人 对吗
[01:28.18]我咬牙坚持
[01:32.17]快要坚持不住
[01:34.51]妈妈还有很多东西要学习
[01:37.98]任务艰巨
[01:40.75]我咬牙坚持
[01:44.67]请抓紧我
[01:46.81]妈妈还有很多东西要学习
[01:50.94]请教教我
[01:54.14]
[01:54.89]最近妈妈感触良多
[01:57.13]怎么说
[01:58.33]比如 萦绕在我心中的感受
[02:02.68]我感觉有点迷茫
[02:07.18]为什么
[02:07.71]不知道怎么说
[02:09.06]我觉得我真的不知道自己在做什么
[02:12.74]
[02:14.27]一点都不懂
[02:17.51]一点都不懂
[02:18.70]让我不禁想要逃离
[02:21.19]我的小宝贝
[02:24.72]请告诉我 你是否切身体会到我以前经历的痛苦
[02:31.09]当你依偎在我的怀里 你能否听到我心碎的声音
[02:37.10]我想让你拥有我未曾拥有过的一切
[02:43.54]如果我的所做所为让你感到伤心 我十分抱歉
[02:50.33]
[02:51.93]我爱你的爸爸 因为他将你送给我
[02:54.39]
[02:56.10]你并不属于我一人 你也是爸爸的心肝宝贝
[02:58.16]//
[02:59.40]我咬牙坚持
[03:03.67]快要坚持不住
[03:06.05]妈妈还有很多东西要学习
[03:09.58]任务艰巨
[03:12.32]我咬牙坚持
[03:16.26]请抓紧我
[03:18.64]妈妈还有很多东西要学习
[03:22.54]请教教我
[03:26.13]
[03:38.25]我陷入人生低谷 我焦虑不安
[03:44.06]
[03:46.97]我敏感多疑 感觉不堪重负
[03:52.28]
[03:53.80]我宿醉未醒 无法确定这是否有帮助
[04:00.85]
[04:06.66]自从我离开他以后 我觉得今天是我第一天体会到孤独滋味
[04:16.48]
[04:20.01]我从未感到孤独 我喜欢独自一人
[04:24.04]
[04:26.13]我总是喜欢一个人独处而不是与朋友在一起
[04:28.49]
[04:31.31]我觉得也许我一直都矫枉过正了
[04:36.00]
[04:37.78]走出家门 诸如此类的事情 让我不去想念他
[04:44.98]我觉得我今天体会到家的温暖 我想留在家里
[04:49.02]我只想看着电视 将自己蜷成一团
[04:53.27]
[04:55.51]穿着我的毛衣 做着类似的事 我只是倍感寂寞
[04:59.31]
[05:01.54]我有点害怕 我可能会沉浸于孤独 无法自拔
